snippet.title: Silver (PC game) - Intro movie - [HD | English]
snippet.description:
WATCH ALSO MY GAMEPLAY OF SILVER PC GAME! :):)  -  look into my YouTube channel.

info:

English version - HD widescreen
Game: Silver 
Platform: PC (windows 98) - I used Virtual PC 2007 + Win98 SE - works!! :D
... but you need to have an original CD. 
Recorded with HyperCam 3.

Greetings from Poland, please subscribe and comment ! :)

Esgaroth
